Although recognize choline use particularly high pregnancy lactation , level choline intake need optimize maternal fetal health outcome unknown . The primary objective study investigate metabolic genomic effect two dos choline intake , 450 mg/d ( adequate intake level pregnant woman ) 900 mg/d pregnant , lactating , nonpregnant control woman . A secondary objective examine effect extra maternal choline intake child 's cognitive performance ( i.e , learning , memory attention ) . To accomplish objective , pregnant woman ( wk 27 gestation ) , nonpregnant control woman , lactate woman consume controlled choline intake 480 930 mg/d 10 12 week . The basal diet provide 380 mg/d ; supplemental choline chloride , 100 550 mg/d , use achieve target intake level . During last half study , small portion ( ~ 20 % ) total choline intake derive deuterium label choline , stable isotope .
